name: Store moved. Click for details.
description: The New Reliable Press shop has moved. Poseur Ink is now handling all of our sales. You can find them all by clicking here. Book available through Poseur Ink include: •Acts of Violence •Jan's Atomic Heart •True Loves 1 & 2 •You Ain't No Dancer Vol. 1, 2 & 3 If you're looking for books by Ed Brisson. They've all been moved to a new shop, which you can find by clicking here. Books available from Ed's personal store include: •Acts of Violence •Black River •Murder Book You can also buy True Loves 1 & 2 and other Jason Turner Projects directly from the man himself by clicking here.
